import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; export default function DonationForm() { const scroll_right = () => { var rightsidescoll = document.querySelector("#scroll_left_and_right_side"); rightsidescoll.scrollBy(1009, 0); }; const scroll_left = () => { var leftsidescoll = document.querySelector("#scroll_left_and_right_side"); leftsidescoll.scrollBy(-1009, 0); }; return (
Blood Donation Form It is said that blood is one of the most priceless gifts one can give to another. Blood is essential for a person to stay alive. Many times due to accidents or any other serious ailments, a person might require blood. And in those times, people who step up to donate their blood are real-life superheroes

What is Your Blood Type ?

 {/* question container 3 */}

Have you done a blood donation before?

 {/* question container 4 */}

Have you had any disease?

 {/* question container 5 */}

Do you have any allergies?

 {/* Terms and Conditions */}
{/* Money Donation Form container */} Cash Donation Form At the end of the day it's not about what you have or even what you've accomplished it's about who you've lifted up, who you've made better. It's about what you've given back.




What is Your Blood Type ?

 {/* question container 3 */}



Have you done a blood donation before?

 {/* question container 4 */}



Have you had any disease?

 {/* question container 5 */}

Do you have any allergies?

 {/* Terms and Conditions */}
); } const MainContainer = styled.section` .ImageContainer { width: 7%; height: 100%; border-radius: 50%; transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; } .ImageContainer:hover { cursor: pointer; transform: scale(1.08); } .main_container { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .main-scroll-div { width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; } .cover { position: relative; width: 100%; height: 100%; } .scroll-images { width: 100%; height: auto; display: flex; justify-content: left; align-items: center; overflow: auto; position: relative; scroll-behavior: smooth; } .scroll-images::-webkit-scrollbar { -webkit-appearance: none; } .child { min-width: 100%; height: 100%; margin: 1px 1px; cursor: pointer; overflow: hidden; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; align-content: center; } `; // Horizontal Row Css const HorizontalRow = styled.hr` border: 1px solid grey; `; // BloodDonation Form Container const DonationOfBloodForm = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width: 100%; overflow: hidden; position: relative; `; const BloodDonationContainer = styled.div` box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 8px 16px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: #090b13; width: 100%; height: 100%; border-radius: 4px; margin: 8px; `; const ImgAndHeadingAndParagraphContainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; padding: 4px; margin: 3px; width: 100%; `; const HeadingAndDetailsContainer = styled.div` box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; padding: 3px; margin: 1px; `; const MainHeadingContainer = styled.p` text-align: center; font-family: "Bree Serif", serif; font-size: 2rem; color: white; font-weight: bold; display: inline-flex; padding: 10px; color: #090b13; border-radius: 5px; word-spacing: 0.5rem; line-height: 1.4rem; `; const MainDetailsContainer = styled.p` text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.5rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 15px; `; const ImgContainer = styled.div` width: 18%; padding: 3px; margin: 1px; img { width: 100%; height: 100%; } `; // Form Details Container const FormDetailsContainer = styled.div` margin-top: 3%; width: 100%; `; // // Name container css const NameContainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; width: 100%; `; const InnerNameContainer = styled.div` margin: 4px; padding: 3px; width: 100%; input { font-size: 1.2rem; text-align: left; width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; color: #040c2a; border: 2px solid #525e8d; padding: 3px; cursor: pointer; &:focus { outline: none; border: 2px solid #090b13; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 8px 16px; } } `; // Phone number container code css const PhoneNumberContainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; width: 100%; `; const CountryCodeContainer = styled.div` margin: 4px; padding: 3px; width: 20%; input { font-size: 1.2rem; text-align: left; width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; color: #090b13; border: 2px solid #525e8d; padding: 3px; cursor: pointer; } input:focus { outline: none; border: 2px solid #090b13; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 8px 16px; } `; const PhoneContainer = styled.div` margin: 4px; padding: 3px; width: 100%; input { font-size: 1.2rem; text-align: left; width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; color: #090b13; border: 2px solid #525e8d; padding: 3px; cursor: pointer; } input:focus { outline: none; border: 2px solid #090b13; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 8px 16px; } `; // css for blood group container const QuestionLabel = styled.label` display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: center; margin: 3px; width: 100%; p { color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; font-weight: bold; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.3rem; padding: 4px; } `; const BloodGroupContainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: flex-start; justify-content: center; width: 100%; `; const PositiveBloodContainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; width: 100%; `; const NegativeBloodContainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; width: 100%; `; const InnerContainer = styled.div` display: flex; width: 95%; label { text-align: left; padding: 4px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.1rem; } input { padding: 2px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; } `; // css for choice container const ChoiceConatainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; width: 100%; `; const ChoiceInnerConatainer = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; width: 98%; label { text-align: left; padding: 4px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.1rem; } input { padding: 2px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; } `; // Terms and condition container const TermsAndConditionConatainer = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; width: 100%; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; `; const TermsAndConditionInnerConatainer = styled.div` width: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: flex-start; label { text-align: left; padding: 4px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 1.2rem; } input { padding: 2px; margin: 3px; text-align: center; color: #090b13; font-family: "Roboto", sans-serif; word-spacing: 0.2rem; line-height: 1.4rem; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; } `; // MoneyDonation Form Container const DonationOfMoneyForm = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; width: 100%; `; // // Right Arrow Container // const RightArrowContainer = styled.div` // width: 5%; // img { // width: 100%; // height: 100%; // border-radius: 50%; // transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; // &:hover { // cursor: pointer; // transform: scale(1.08); // } // } // `; // // // // // {/* // */} // // {/* Form 1 Container For Swapping */} // // // // // // // // Blood Donation Form // // It is said that blood is one of the most priceless gifts one // can give to another. Blood is essential for a person to stay // alive. Many times due to accidents or any other serious // ailments, a person might require blood. And in those times, // people who step up to donate their blood are real-life // superheroes // // // // //
